mmc_submission_timing: Full MMC package submits to USCG same week
deployment_readiness: Immediate deployment, no relocation from Plano area, ready for Gulf/East/West rotations
pitch: I am an active TWIC holder seeking an Entry-Level Deckhand / Dredge Crew / Tankerman Trainee position. I have 250 documented sea days (company letters attached) and have completed all USCG-approved coursework: STCW Basic, Able Seafarer Deck, RFPNW, PSC, VPDSD. Tankerman PIC (LG & DL) finishes March 6, 2026. Full MMC package submits to USCG same week. Drug-free, medically fit, no relocation needed from Plano area, ready for immediate deployment on inland/Gulf dredging/towing to continue building sea time.
sea_days_note: 250 documented sea days with company letters attached.
